title: Sophisticated Singapore Escape - Park Hotel Clarke Quay
description: Explore the foodie hub of Singapore, staying at the Park Hotel Clarke Quay, overlooking the famous Singapore River. With full access to the hotel's Crystal Club Lounge including daily breakfasts, nightly free-flow drinks and canapes, a late check out and a lavish three course modern European dinner for two,  you will love every minute of this luxury getaway.

title: Club Lounge Benefits in the Heart of Singapore
description: Explore the gateway to Asia during your stay in Singapore, staying at the Park Hotel Clarke Quay, overlooking the famous Singapore River. With full access to the hotel's Crystal Club Lounge including daily breakfasts, nightly free-flow drinks and canapes and a 2pm late checkout, you will love every minute of this getaway. Stay three, five or seven nights and indulge in a lavish three-course dinner at Porta Restaurant.
